title: Seafood omelette with creamy cheese sauce
ingredients: ['Filling', '60ml chicken stock', '1 tbsp Dijon mustard', '4 tbsp double cream', '2 tbsp butter', '170g (6 oz) tinned crab meat', '170g (6 oz) small, cooked and peeled prawns', 'Sauce', '60ml double cream', '1 tsp Dijon mustard', '115g (4 oz) Cheddar, grated', 'dash nutmeg', 'salt and pepper, to taste', 'Omelette', '4 eggs, beaten', '60ml double cream', 'salt and pepper']
